actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for a single 6-year term for the President and to limit the number of consecutive Congresses in which Senators and Representatives may serve.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides for a single six-year term for the President. Limits to six the number of consecutive Congresses in which Senators and Representatives may serve.

titles.title: A resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for a single 6-year term for the President and to limit the number of consecutive Congresses in which Senators and Representatives may serve.
